entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 22.
